about_the_game:
Aliens, robots and ghosts, oh my! Imagining modern day and the near future through the eyes of science fiction can be a challenging task. Paranormal Monsters battler pack is here to help!

Created by Thalzon, this imaginative battler pack features both staples such as invading alien entities and unique enemies such as a toilet possessed by the spirit of a hungry gator. With 59 battlers to choose from, you're guaranteed to find just the right enemy for your contemporary or futuristic game.

Features:
  • 59 side-view static battlers, with or without shadows.
  • Supernatural enemies such as ghosts, mutants and aliens.
  • Battle with modern and futuristic elements such as tanks, robots and evil scientists!
  • Brightly-colored and imaginative pieces that work with Thalzon's free battler designs.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker only
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Paranormal Monsters" and "RPG Maker MV - Paranormal Monsters" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution
